title: account doenst exist anymore??
body: I was playing a game yesterday, and when the game finished, for some reason it skipped the post game screen and the window just closed. when i went to re open and kog in, it said "Invalid username/password combination.  Please try again." i retried a few more times, and it still doesnt work. ive seen a few posts about this issue, and it looks like their problems had to do with being on the wrong server, but im not. ive played on NA since i got the game and in the launcer it still says NA. pls help

replies.body:
It sounds like someone has accessed your account. I suggest changing the password for the email linked to your account before reaching out to us in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) We'll have an account specialist grab your ticket as soon as possible.

Let me know if you have any issues submitting your ticket.
